Advice only

I think there's a missing area on gov.uk around scams; not just financial ones. There are scams around specific services, around organisations and thematic types of scam. I think it's worth talking though.

Advice only

V high use - 18,257 in F2012

This DG article, although containing advice at the beginning does contain information on statutory rights (pension, benefits). Some of the information on how to hand in your notice is in the quick answer on handing in your notice (also constructive dismissal is in dismissal guide but not sure user would intuitively go to a guide on dismissal if they resigned as a result of constructive dismissal) but other info isn't. Info on notice pay is contained in redundancy guide but again not sure that user who had resigned would intuitively go to the guide or know whether in this situation their rights applied.
